mapper.select: SELECT TX_ID AS txId, ERROR_DATETIME AS errorDatetime, CALLEE_CHASU AS calleeChasu, CORP_CODE AS corpCode, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, BRANCH_NAME AS branchName, CORNER_CODE AS cornerCode, CORNER_NAME AS cornerName, PLACE_GUBUN AS placeGubun, REGION_GUBUN AS regionGubun, TERMINAL_NO AS terminalNo, CALLEE_GUBUN AS calleeGubun, CALLEE_RESULT AS calleeResult, CALLEE_REQ_DATETIME AS calleeReqDatetime, ARRIVAL_DATETIME AS arrivalDatetime, HANDLE_DATETIME AS handleDatetime, RECOVER_DATETIME AS recoverDatetime, ELAPSED_TIME AS elapsedTime, ELAPSED_SECONDS AS elapsedSeconds, ERROR_CONTENT AS errorContent, MODEL_NAME AS modelName, ACCEPT AS accept, REFUSE_REASON AS refuseReason FROM ATMS_SLA_F0

SELECT TX_ID AS txId, ERROR_DATETIME AS errorDatetime, CALLEE_CHASU AS calleeChasu, CORP_CODE AS corpCode, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, BRANCH_NAME AS branchName, CORNER_CODE AS cornerCode, CORNER_NAME AS cornerName, PLACE_GUBUN AS placeGubun, REGION_GUBUN AS regionGubun, TERMINAL_NO AS terminalNo, CALLEE_GUBUN AS calleeGubun, CALLEE_RESULT AS calleeResult, CALLEE_REQ_DATETIME AS calleeReqDatetime, ARRIVAL_DATETIME AS arrivalDatetime, HANDLE_DATETIME AS handleDatetime, RECOVER_DATETIME AS recoverDatetime, ELAPSED_TIME AS elapsedTime, ELAPSED_SECONDS AS elapsedSeconds, ERROR_CONTENT AS errorContent, MODEL_NAME AS modelName, ACCEPT AS accept, REFUSE_REASON AS refuseReason FROM ATMS_SLA_F0 WHERE TX_ID = #{txId}, ERROR_DATETIME = #{errorDatetime}, CALLEE_CHASU = #{calleeChasu}
mapper.update: DELETE FROM ATMS_SLA_F0 WHERE TX_ID = #{txId}, ERROR_DATETIME = #{errorDatetime}, CALLEE_CHASU = #{calleeChasu}

UPDATE ATMS_SLA_F0 SET CORP_CODE = #{corpCode}, BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, BRANCH_NAME = #{branchName}, CORNER_CODE = #{cornerCode}, CORNER_NAME = #{cornerName}, PLACE_GUBUN = #{placeGubun}, REGION_GUBUN = #{regionGubun}, TERMINAL_NO = #{terminalNo}, CALLEE_GUBUN = #{calleeGubun}, CALLEE_RESULT = #{calleeResult}, CALLEE_REQ_DATETIME = #{calleeReqDatetime}, ARRIVAL_DATETIME = #{arrivalDatetime}, HANDLE_DATETIME = #{handleDatetime}, RECOVER_DATETIME = #{recoverDatetime}, ELAPSED_TIME = #{elapsedTime}, ELAPSED_SECONDS = #{elapsedSeconds}, ERROR_CONTENT = #{errorContent}, MODEL_NAME = #{modelName}, ACCEPT = #{accept}, REFUSE_REASON = #{refuseReason} WHERE TX_ID = #{txId}, ERROR_DATETIME = #{errorDatetime}, CALLEE_CHASU = #{calleeChasu}

INSERT INTO ATMS_SLA_F0 ( TX_ID, ERROR_DATETIME, CALLEE_CHASU, CORP_CODE, BRANCH_CODE, BRANCH_NAME, CORNER_CODE, CORNER_NAME, PLACE_GUBUN, REGION_GUBUN, TERMINAL_NO, CALLEE_GUBUN, CALLEE_RESULT, CALLEE_REQ_DATETIME, ARRIVAL_DATETIME, HANDLE_DATETIME, RECOVER_DATETIME, ELAPSED_TIME, ELAPSED_SECONDS, ERROR_CONTENT, MODEL_NAME, ACCEPT, REFUSE_REASON ) VALUES ( #{txId}, #{errorDatetime}, #{calleeChasu}, #{corpCode}, #{branchCode}, #{branchName}, #{cornerCode}, #{cornerName}, #{placeGubun}, #{regionGubun}, #{terminalNo}, #{calleeGubun}, #{calleeResult}, #{calleeReqDatetime}, #{arrivalDatetime}, #{handleDatetime}, #{recoverDatetime}, #{elapsedTime}, #{elapsedSeconds}, #{errorContent}, #{modelName}, #{accept}, #{refuseReason} )
